definition: to depend on/to hang on in a place/bad/to renege (on promise)/to disclaim/to rat (on debts)/rascally/to blame/to put the blame on
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

sentences.english: In any case, however, Mr. Ryan was more right than he knew.
sentences.chinese: 無論如何，賴安先生的做法都超出了他平常的認知。

sentences.english: My 16-year-old brother, Ryan, was out late with friends one night.
sentences.chinese: 一天，我16歲的兄弟賴安和朋友外出回來晚了。

sentences.english: Natalia talks to Ryan and Alex about her breaking up with her boyfriend.
sentences.chinese: 納塔利向賴安和艾麗克斯說起與男友分手的事。
